description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A province-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，简称中国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军空军中将

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军现行军衔制度中的副战区级及以上军官的主要军衔。
description.en: A primary rank for officers at or above the deputy theater command level in the current rank system of the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海军装备部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军装备部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军中负责装备工作的部门。
description.en: The department within the People's Liberation Army Navy responsible for equipment.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军三大舰队之一，现为中国人民解放军南部战区海军。
description.en: One of the three major fleets of the People's Liberation Army Navy, now known as the PLA Southern Theater Command Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军三大舰队之一，现为中国人民解放军北部战区海军。
description.en: One of the three major fleets of the People's Liberation Army Navy, now known as the PLA Northern Theater Command Navy.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队航天系统部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队航天系统部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队下属机构。
description.en: A subordinate department of the PLA Strategic Support Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军空军政治工作部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军政治工作部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军党委实施政治工作的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ for implementing political work under the Party Committee of the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任空军政治工作部主任。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army Air Force, former Director of the Political Work Department of the Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任战略支援部队航天系统部政治委员。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army, former Political Commissar of the Aerospace Systems Department of the Strategic Support Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任战略支援部队航天系统部政治委员。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, former Political Commissar of the Aerospace Systems Department of the Strategic Support Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军空军中将

description.en: Promoted to the rank of Lieutenant General in December 2019.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军装备部

description.zh-cn: 在2013年12月之前曾任中国人民解放军海军装备部办公室主任。
description.en: Served as the Office Director of the PLA Navy Armament Department before December 2013.

position.en: Director of the Political Department of the Aviation Force

position.zh-cn: 副政治委员兼北海舰队航空兵政治委员
position.en: Deputy Political Commissar and Political Commissar of the North Sea Fleet Aviation Force

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队航天系统部
中国人民解放军空军政治工作部

description.zh-cn: 接替堵远放，担任中国人民解放军空军政治工作部主任。
description.en: Succeeded Du Yuanfang as Director of the Political Work Department of the People's Liberation Army Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 接替康春元，担任中国人民解放军战略支援部队航天系统部政治委员。
description.en: Succeeded Kang Chunyuan as Political Commissar of the Aerospace Systems Department of the People's Liberation Army Strategic Support Force.

description.zh-cn: 接替姜平，担任中国人民解放军战略支援部队航天系统部政治委员。
description.en: Succeeded Jiang Ping as Political Commissar of the Aerospace Systems Department of the People's Liberation Army Strategic Support Force.
